content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) connected to offshore pump via pipes (currently fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=5262) connecting to mining drills

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills at:
  - (15.5, 70.5) - output blocked
  - (18.5, 70.5) - output blocked
  - (21.5, 70.5) - output blocked
  - (24.5, 70.5) - output blocked
  - (27.5, 70.5) - output blocked
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 68.0) - no fuel
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 65.0) - no fuel
- 5 Burner inserters between iron and steel furnaces
- 5 Wooden chests at output positions
- 5 Burner inserters connecting drills to chests (all facing UP)

## ERROR TIPS

### Fluid System Connection Issues (continued)
- Failed to connect boiler to steam engine due to water obstruction
- Verify fluid connection paths are clear of water before placement
- Consider using underground pipes to cross water obstacles

### Output Blockage Issues (continued)
- Mining drills repeatedly blocked despite inserter reconfiguration
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions match chest/drill orientations
- Ensure chests have available inventory space before production

### Inventory Management Errors (new)
- Attempted to insert coal into full furnaces
- Check inventory status before attempting insert operations
- Implement proper inventory management checks

### Entity Placement Conflicts (continued)
- Attempted pipe placements in water or occupied positions
- Verify position is empty and land-based before placing pipes
- Use get_entities_at() to check for existing entities

### Assertion Failures (continued)
- Power status assertions failing for mining drills
- Address root power connection issues before asserting status
- Verify all power pole connections are valid

### Inserter Configuration Issues (new)
- Multiple inserters placed in same position (x=16.5 y=72.5)
- Verify inserter positions are unique before placement
- Remove duplicate entities before placing new ones
